backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles and CRUD operations for publishers with access‑controlled queries and updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required frontend changes, involved files, components, and test IDs for territory table enhancements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like text providing summaries of various frontend files and components for reference.
frontend/.env: Environment file setting the Internet Identity provider URL.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and OKLCH theme variable definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React routing setup with authentication gating, layout rendering, and all app routes defined.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App shell containing header, sidebar, and routed content area with toast support.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with app title, mobile menu button, and logout logic clearing auth and cache.
frontend/src/components/layout/Sidebar.t: Responsive sidebar component providing navigation links with active-state styling and mobile toggle behavior.
frontend/src/components/notes/AddGlobalN: Modal for creating or editing global notes with category selection, publisher attachment, validation, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/notes/GlobalNote: Card displaying a global note with category badge, content preview, date, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/publishers/AddPu: Modal for adding a new publisher with form fields, validation, and submission via mutation.
frontend/src/components/publishers/EditP: Modal for editing an existing publisher, initializing form fields from data and updating via mutation.
frontend/src/components/tasks/AddTaskMod: Modal for creating a new task with title, due date, category, notes, validation, and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/tasks/EditTaskMo: Modal form for editing a task, initializing fields from the task and submitting updates via useUpdateTask.
frontend/src/components/territories/AddT: Modal for creating a new territory with validation and submission through useCreateTerritory.
frontend/src/components/territories/Chec: Displays a sorted table of a territory’s checkout history with dates and campaign status.
Modal for checking out a territory to a publisher, including campaign flag and publisher lookup.
frontend/src/components/territories/Dele: Confirmation dialog for deleting a territory note using useDeleteTerritoryNote.
frontend/src/components/territories/Edit: Modal for editing a territory’s number and type with validation and update submission.
Modal for editing the content of a territory note and saving updates via useUpdateTerritoryNote.
frontend/src/components/territories/Terr: Card displaying a territory note’s content and date with edit and delete action buttons.
Renders a notes composer and list for a territory, handling creation, sorting, editing, and deletion of notes via modals and hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddPublisher.ts: Provides a mutation to add a publisher, mapping UI privilege values to backend format and invalidating the publishers list.
Defines a mutation to check out a territory to a publisher and refreshes related territory queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateGlobalNote.t: Handles creating global notes with validation and invalidates global notes queries after creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTask.ts: Provides a mutation to create a task from given params and invalidates all task queries afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTerritory.ts: Creates a new territory with a generated ID and refreshes the territories list on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteGlobalNote.t: Deletes a global note by ID and invalidates the global notes query.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeletePublisher.ts: Deletes a publisher with optimistic updates and rollback handling, then refreshes the publishers list.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteTask.ts: Defines a mutation to delete a task and invalidates task queries afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalNotes.ts: Provides queries to fetch all global notes or a single note using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing login, stored identities, and auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes queries to fetch all publishers or a single publisher using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTasks.ts: Provides queries to fetch tasks by status or a single task from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritories.ts: Supplies a query for fetching all territories via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritory.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching, updating, deleting, and modifying the status of territories, with cache invalidation for territory-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritoryNotes.ts: Implements hooks to fetch, create, update, and delete territory notes, triggering cache invalidation for note lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateGlobalNote.t: Defines a mutation hook to update a global note and invalidate the global notes query cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePublisher.ts: Provides a mutation hook to update publisher data, including privilege mapping, and invalidates the publishers list cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTask.ts: Exposes a hook to update tasks and refresh all task queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTaskCompleti: Offers a hook to update task completion state and invalidate task queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind styles and custom OKLCH color variables, including light/dark themes and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/ComingSoon.tsx: Renders a simple placeholder page displaying a title and 'Coming Soon' message.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Implements the login screen using Internet Identity with a styled authentication button.
frontend/src/pages/Notes.tsx: Displays, filters, sorts, creates, edits, and deletes global notes with modal and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/PublisherProfile.tsx: Shows a detailed publisher profile with edit and delete functionality, including privilege display and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/Publishers.tsx: Page for listing, filtering, adding, editing, and deleting publishers with search, group, and active-status filters.
frontend/src/pages/Tasks.tsx: Page for viewing, filtering, adding, editing, completing, and deleting tasks with backend-driven status filtering.
frontend/src/pages/Territories.tsx: Displays all territories, their status, checkout duration, and provides navigation and adding new territories.
frontend/src/pages/TerritoryProfile.tsx: Shows a single territory’s details, status actions, edit/delete options, checkout history, and notes.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Utility functions for converting backend timestamps (nanoseconds/seconds) into formatted date strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, extended theme utilities, animations, and typography/container-query/animate plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s current feature state, outlining territory checkout-duration requirements, architecture notes, and existing feature definitions.
